responses: digital farming is the use of digital technology to integrate agricultural production from the paddock to the consumer
Its Offering  soil sensing, irrigation control, farm management, machinery, and crop lifecycle management.
all types of farmers can benefit frm digital farming
precision, decision, and cultivation

patterns: What are the benifits of Precision farming?
responses: Precision agriculture (PA) is an approach to farm management that uses information technology (IT) to ensure that crops and soil receive exactly what they need for optimum health and productivity

Its Reduced costs ,Increased Profitability , Enhanced Sustainability ,Better Harvestability ,Increased Land Values , Higher Resolutions Understanding of the farmers Farm ,Better In season Yield Understanding

I-Precision Agriculture (PA) iyindlela yokuphatha amapulazi esebenzisa ubuchwepheshe bezolwazi (IT) ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi izitshalo nomhlabathi zithola lokho kanye ezikudingayo ukuze uthole impilo enhle nokukhiqiza.
Izindleko zayo Ezincishisiwe ,Ukwandisa Inzuzo
Ukuzinza Okuthuthukisiwe ,Ukuvunwa Okungcono ,Ukwenyuka Kwamanani Omhlaba
Ukuqonda Izinqumo Eziphakeme Zepulazi Labalimi ,Okungcono Ngesizini khiqiza ukuqonda

responses: Decision is the use of quality information that is timely and within the decision loop
Is uses advanced sensors, descriptive models, and predictive algorithms to provide insight to crops, equipment, and other challenges
Isinqumo ukusetshenziswa kolwazi lwekhwalithi olufika ngesikhathi futhi ngaphakathi kwe-loop yesinqumo
Isebenzisa izinzwa ezithuthukisiwe, amamodeli achazayo, nama-algorithms wokubikezela ukuze inikeze ukuqonda ezitshalweni, okokusebenza, nezinye izinselele.
Ukusebenzisa isikhathi sangempela , nemishini ukuze kwenziwe izinqumo ngo kuthukulula nokuhlephula (ukulinywa) komhlabathi
It uses observation power to  destroy weeds and promote growth by increasing soil aeration and water infiltration.

patterns: What are the benefits of indoor farming?
responses: Indoor farming is the practice and process of growing crops and produce in vertically stacked layers
It providing jobs and fresh food for family, friends, and your community; and avoiding common farming dangers like chemical exposure, weather condition hazards, and pests/insects.
Ukulima kwasendlini kuwumkhuba kanye nenqubo yokutshala izitshalo futhi kukhiqizwe ngezingqimba eziqondile

Ihlinzeka ngemisebenzi nokudla okusha komndeni, abangani, kanye nomphakathi wakho; futhi igwema izingozi ezivamile zokulima njengokuchayeka kwamakhemikhali, izingozi zesimo sezulu, nezinambuzane/izinambuzane.

it is quite expensive , Vertical farms can take a lot of power

it is quite expensive , Vertical farms can take a lot of power

patterns: What are the benifits of cultivation farming
What do you mean by cultivation
What is the use of cultivation
How are insect pests managed on organic farms?
How are weeds managed on organic farms?
How do organic animals meet their nutritional requirements?
What are the living conditions for organic livestock?
What is an Organic Systems Management Plan?
Are there health benefits associated with eating organic food?
What are the advantages of modern farming methods?
Which soil is most suitable for agriculture?
What are some of the benefits of vertical farming?
What are the branches of agriculture?
responses: Cultivation is the act of caring for or raising plants. Your desire to grow your own fruits and vegetables in the backyard means you'll be engaged in some heavy cultivation. The word cultivation is most often used to talk about the ways that farmers take care of crops

Cultivation, also known as tilling or soil refinement, is the act of digging into or cutting up an existing soil bed to better prepare it for planting. You might use a tractor, a rototiller, or hand tools such as a shovel or soil fork

Cultivation, Loosening and breaking up (tilling) of the soil , The soil around existing plants is cultivated (by hand using a hoe, or by machine using a cultivator) to destroy weeds and promote growth by increasing soil aeration and water infiltration

Shifting cultivation is commonly practiced in the tropics. It involves forest clearance through burning and slashing. The cleared land is cultivated until its fertility declines, or for three to five years or until native flora and weeds overtake it. When that happens, farmers abandon the land for a fallow period and clear another forest area for cultivation

Nomadic herding is the practice of keeping and grazing animals on natural pastures. It is common in the arid and semi-arid regions such as certain parts of Saudi Arabia, northern Africa and northern parts of Eurasia. The practice resembles pastoral farming

Unlike other types of agricultural activities, rudimentary sedentary cultivation is a type of subsistence farming practiced on the same piece of land year-in, year-out. Land is then left fallow after some years to regain its soil fertility. It is commonly practiced in the tropics and involves the growth of tree crops such as the Para rubber tree and grains

Livestock ranching focuses on rearing animals. Unlike nomadic herding, farmers do not move from one place to another in search of pasture and water, but live in settlements. Pasture lands are developed for grazing the animals. Many areas across the globe with large pieces of land with enough grazing areas for animals

Also known as tree crop farming, industrialized agriculture or plantation farming, commercial plantations cover large land areas. Even if practiced on a smaller piece of land, the activity has a high commercial value. It involves the cultivation of tropical crops such as tea, rubber, coffee, coconut, cocoa, grapes, apples, spices, oranges, avocado, mangoes and palm oil

Also known as grain and livestock farming, mixed farming involves the growing of crops and rearing of animals. It has its origins in the humid, mid-latitudes, excluding Asia. It is an agricultural activity with its roots mainly in Europe. Mixed farming develops in close relation to market infrastructure.

Increased demand for horticultural products in highly urbanized areas with dense populations led to the development of specialized horticulture. It has been successfully adopted in northern Hungary, France and the Swiss Lake regions for vineyard cultivation

Subsistence farming involves growing crops and keeping animals for the sole purpose of feeding the farmer and his family. It involves the use of simple farm tools on small pieces of land. Most subsistence farmers are believed to be poor and thus cannot afford to buy improved seeds and fertilizers. Therefore, they farm on land with low soil fertility or rough terrains.

Mediterranean agriculture involves the rearing of animals and growing of crops in the rugged, Mediterranean terrain. Small animals and crops such as citrus fruits, vineyards and wheat are the crops mainly grown in the region. Horticulture is also practiced with the majority of crops sown in winter due to winter rains

Dairy farming involves the rearing of cattle for milk. With its origins in Europe, the activity is highly developed in Sweden and Denmark. However, it has spread to other parts of the world and is practiced in areas near markets. It thrives in regions that enjoy temperate climate

Commercial grain farming resulted from mechanization of farms. It is mainly practiced in areas with less-dense population and low rainfall. The grains grown in these areas are drought and weather hardy and thus can survive in dry conditions. Mainly adopted in steppes, prairies and the temperate grasslands of Australia and South America, the activity mainly involves wheat monoculture

Arable farming, unlike pastoral or mixed farming, involves the growing of crops without keeping animals. It can be practiced on a large, commercial or small scale. Annual crops such as plantains, vegetables, grains, cassava, potatoes and legumes are often grown in arable farms

patterns: Izilwane eziphilayo zihlangabezana kanjani nezidingo zazo zokudla okunomsoco?
Ingabe zikhona izinzuzo zezempilo ezihlobene nokudla ukudla okuphilayo?
Iziphi ezinye zezinzuzo zokulima zibheke phezulu?
responses: Ukulima kuyisenzo sokunakekela noma ukukhulisa izitshalo. Isifiso sakho sokutshala izithelo nemifino yakho ngemuva kwegceke kusho ukuthi uzobe ulima kanzima. Igama elithi ukulima lisetshenziswa kakhulu uma kukhulunywa ngezindlela abalimi abazisebenzisayo. ukunakekela izitshalo

Ukulima, okubuye kwaziwe ngokuthi ukutshala noma ukucolisiswa kwenhlabathi, kuyisenzo sokumba noma sokusika umbhede okhona ukuze ulungele ukutshala. Ungasebenzisa ugandaganda, i-rototiller, noma amathuluzi esandla njengefosholo noma imfoloko yomhlabathi.

Ukutshala, ukuxegisa nokuhlephula (ukulinywa) komhlabathi ,Inhlabathi ezungeze izitshalo ezikhona iyalinywa (ngesandla kusetshenziswa igeja, noma ngomshini kusetshenziswa umlimi) ukuze kucekelwe phansi ukhula futhi kukhuthaze ukukhula ngokukhulisa ukungena komoya emhlabathini namanzi. ukungena

Ukulima ngokushintshashintsha kuvame ukwenziwa ezindaweni ezishisayo. Kuhilela ukususa amahlathi ngokushiswa nokusikwa. Izwe eligawuliwe liyalinywa kuze kube kuncipha ukuvunda kwalo, noma iminyaka emithathu kuya kwemihlanu noma kuze kudliwe izitshalo nokhula. Uma lokho kwenzeka, abalimi bayayishiya. umhlabathi isikhathi sokulinywa bese ususa enye indawo yehlathi ukuze ulinywe

Ukwelusa ama-Nomadic kuwumkhuba wokugcina kanye nokuklaba izilwane emadlelweni emvelo. Kuvamile ezindaweni ezomile nezincane njengezingxenye ezithile zeSaudi Arabia, enyakatho ye-Afrika kanye nezingxenye ezisenyakatho ye-Eurasia. Lo mkhuba ufana nokulima

Ngokungafani nezinye izinhlobo zemisebenzi yezolimo, ukulima okungajwayelekile kuwuhlobo lokuziphilisa olwenziwa endaweni efanayo unyaka nonyaka, unyaka nonyaka. Umhlaba ube usushiywa ungafumile ngemva kweminyaka ethile ukuze umhlabathi uvunde. Kujwayele ukwenziwa njalo. ezindaweni ezishisayo futhi kuhilela ukukhula kwezitshalo zezihlahla njengesihlahla senjoloba iPara kanye nezinhlamvu

Ukufuya kugxile ekukhuliseni izilwane. Ngokungafani nokwelusa imfuyo, abalimi abasuki kwenye indawo beyofuna amadlelo namanzi kodwa bahlala ezindaweni zokuhlala. Amadlelo athuthukiswa ukuze kudliwe imfuyo. Izindawo eziningi emhlabeni wonke zinezicucu ezinkulu. umhlaba onamadlelo anele ezilwane

Okwaziwa nangokuthi ukulima kwezitshalo zezihlahla, ukulima okuthuthukisiwe noma ukulima kwezitshalo, amasimu okuhweba ahlanganisa izindawo ezinkulu zomhlaba. Ngisho noma senziwa endaweni encane, umsebenzi unenani eliphakeme lokuhweba. Uhilela ukutshalwa kwezitshalo ezishisayo njengetiye, noma ukulima kwezitshalo zezihlahla, ukulima okuthuthukisiwe noma ukulima kwezitshalo, amasimu okuhweba ahlanganisa izindawo ezinkulu zomhlaba. irabha, ikhofi, ukhukhunathi, ukhokho, amagilebhisi, ama-apula, izinongo, amawolintshi, ukwatapheya, umango namafutha esundu

Okwaziwa nangokuthi ukulima okusanhlamvu nemfuyo, ukulima okuxubile kuhilela ukutshalwa kwezitshalo kanye nokukhulisa izilwane. Umsuka wako endaweni enomswakama, phakathi nendawo, ngaphandle kwe-Asia. Kungumsebenzi wezolimo onezimpande zawo ikakhulukazi eYurophu. Ukulima okuxubile ithuthuka ngokusondelana nengqalasizinda yemakethe.

Ukwanda kwesidingo semikhiqizo ye-horticultural ezindaweni ezihlala emadolobheni anabantu abaningi kwaholela ekuthuthukisweni kwe-horticulture ekhethekile. Semukelwe ngempumelelo ezindaweni ezisenyakatho yeHungary, eFrance naseSwiss Lake ukuze kulinywe isivini

Ukuziphilisa ngokulima kuhlanganisa ukutshala izitshalo kanye nokugcina izilwane ngenjongo yokondla umlimi nomndeni wakhe kuphela. Kuhilela ukusetshenziswa kwamathuluzi alula okulima ezindaweni ezincane zomhlaba. Abalimi abaningi abaziphilisa ngokuziphilisa bakholelwa ukuthi bampofu ngakho abakwazi ukuthenga izinto ezithuthukisiwe. imbewu kanye nomanyolo. Ngakho-ke, balima emhlabathini ovundile ophansi noma ezindaweni ezimbi.

Ukulima kweMedithera kuhilela ukukhuliswa kwezilwane kanye nokukhula kwezitshalo ezindaweni ezimangelengele, zaseMedithera. Izilwane ezincane nezitshalo ezifana nezithelo ezisawolintshi, izivini nokolweni yizitshalo ezitshalwa kakhulu esifundeni. Ukulima kwezitshalo nakho kwenziwa ngezitshalo eziningi ezitshaliwe. ebusika ngenxa yezimvula zasebusika

Ukufuywa kobisi kuhilela ukufuywa kwezinkomo zobisi. Njengoba umsuka walo e-Europe, lo msebenzi uthuthuke kakhulu eSweden naseDenmark. Nokho, ususabalele nakwezinye izingxenye zomhlaba futhi uqhutshwa ezindaweni eziseduze nezimakethe. Uyachuma ezindaweni ezijabulela isimo sezulu esipholile

Ukulinywa okusanhlamvu okudalwe ngenjongo yokusetshenziswa kwemishini emapulazini. Kusetshenziswa kakhulu ezindaweni ezinabantu abangaminyene kakhulu nemvula encane. Izinhlamvu ezitshalwa kulezi zindawo zinesomiso kanye nesimo sezulu esiqinile futhi ngenxa yalokho ziyakwazi ukuphila endaweni eyomile. Ikakhulukazi etholwa ezindaweni ezihlala amathafa, amathafa kanye nezizinda ezinotshani ezipholile zase-Australia naseNingizimu Melika, umsebenzi ikakhulukazi uhilela ukolweni oyedwa

Ukulima okulinywayo, akufani nokulima okuxubile noma okuxubile, kubandakanya ukutshala izilimo ngaphandle kokufuya imfuyo. Kungaqhutshwa ngezinga elikhulu, ezentengiselwano noma ezincane. Izitshalo zonyaka ezifana nama-plantain, imifino, okusanhlamvu, umdumbula, amazambane kanye nemidumba kuvame ukulinywa. emapulazini alinywayo

Izilimo ezitshalwa ngenkathi yeziphepho zaziwa ngokuthi izitshalo zeKharif. Isib., ummbila, unyaluthi, ukotini. Imbewu ihlwanyelwa ekuqaleni kwenkathi yezimvula futhi ivunwa ekupheleni kwenkathi yemvula. Izitshalo ezinjalo zidinga amanzi amaningi kanye nesimo sezulu esishisayo ukuze sikhule kahle

Igama elithi Rabi lisho intwasahlobo - igama elisuselwa olimini lwesi-Arabhu. Izitshalo ezitshalwa ngenkathi yasebusika futhi zivunwa entwasahlobo zibizwa ngokuthi izitshalo zamaRabi. Ukolweni, igram, kanye nesinaphi ngezinye zezitshalo zamaRabi. Izindlela zokulima zenziwa ukuze kukhiqizwe izinhlobo ezintsha zezitshalo. Izitshalo ezinjalo zidinga isimo sezulu esifudumele ukuze zihlume futhi zivuthwe. Kodwa-ke, zidinga isimo sezulu esibandayo ukuze zikhule

Izilimo ezinjalo zitshalwa phakathi kwezinkathi zeKharif neRabi, okungukuthi, phakathi kukaMashi noJuni .Lezi zitshalo zivuthwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi. Ikhukhamba, ithanga, ukhamba olubabayo, kanye nekhabe izitshalo zeZaid

Ukukhiqizwa kokudla okuphilayo kusekelwe ohlelweni lokulima olulingisa imvelo yemvelo elinganisa inani lezinambuzane nenzuzo ephilayo futhi igcine futhi igcwalise umhlabathi ovundile. Igama elithi 'organic' e-United States lisetshenziswa emikhiqizweni yezolimo ekhiqizwa emapulazini banamathele kumthetho we-USDA's National Organic Programme (NOP)

Izinhlelo ze-Organic farm zivikela ukulinyazwa kwezitshalo yizinambuzane eziwuhlupho ngokuyinhloko ngokusebenzisa izinqubo zebhayoloji nezamasiko ezifana nokushintshanisa izitshalo; ukuhlukahluka; ukuphathwa kwezindawo zokuhlala; ukukhishwa kwezinto eziphilayo ezizuzisayo; ukukhucululwa kwendle; kanye nesikhathi. Ezinye izinto zemvelo, njenge-botanicals, kanye nezimbalwa ngokuqhathaniswa izibulala-zinambuzane ezingezona ezinobuthi ezifana nensipho zivunyelwe yi-USDA National Organic Program Standards uma zisetshenziswa ngokuhambisana nohlelo lwepulazi futhi zisetshenziswa ngokuhambisana nemikhawulo etholakala ku-National List

Ukulawulwa kokhula emapulazini aphilayo kuhlanganisa amasu amasiko kanye nemishini efana nokushintshaniswa kwezitshalo ezicindezela ukhula, ukumboza, ukulinywa, ukulinywa, ukulawulwa kwamanzi, nokukhipha ukhula ngezandla. Ukhula ngokuvamile lusiza ukulondoloza umhlabathi, ukuthuthukisa izinto eziphilayo, kanye nokunikeza indawo yokuhlala enenzuzo. ezitheni zemvelo emapulazini ezinto eziphilayo. Izimbobo zepulasitiki zivunyelwe uma nje zisuswa ekupheleni kwesizini

Yonke imikhiqizo yezolimo ehlinzekwe kwi-feed ration kumele ibe yi-organic, ibe nenani elilinganiselwe le-supplementation kanye nezithasiselo. Imfuyo edlayo kufanele ibe nengxenye enkulu yezidingo zayo zokudla ezihlangatshezwa amadlelo

Zonke izilwane eziphilayo zidingeka ukuthi zikwazi ukufinyelela ngaphandle nasezindaweni zokuzivocavoca, futhi kufanele zihlinzekwe ngezimo zokuphila ezinempilo. Izilwane ezilusayo nazo kudingeka zithole ukufinyelela emadlelweni

Isitifiketi se-Organic sidinga i-Organic Systems Management Plan, eyaziwa nangokuthi i-Organic Farm Plan noma i-Organic Handling Plan. Le mibhalo ikhomba ukuthi ubani onesibopho sokusebenza kwe-organic futhi ichaza izinqubo zokuphatha kanye nokugcinwa kwamarekhodi ukuze kuqashwe ukusetshenziswa kwalolo hlelo. Uhlelo lusebenza njenge Inkontileka phakathi komqhubi kanye nesitifiketi. Iningi labanikezeli bezitifiketi lisiza abaqhubi ekuthuthukiseni uhlelo lwabo ngokunikeza amafomu nemibhalo yokuqondisa. Izinhlelo Zokulawulwa Kwezinhlelo Zemvelo kufanele zibuyekezwe okungenani minyaka yonke ukuze kugcinwe isimo sezinto eziphilayo eziqinisekisiwe

Isidingo sabathengi semikhiqizo ye-organic e-EU sesilokhu sikhula kancane isikhathi esingaphezu kweminyaka eyishumi, futhi isabelo somkhakha wokulima ngokwemvelo siyanda emazweni amaningi angamaLungu. Ngakho-ke, kuyingxenye ebalulekile ye-bioeconomy yaseYurophu. Lona umnotho. yakhelwe phezu kwemithombo yebhayoloji ngokugcizelela okuhlukahlukene emahlathini, ezolimo, olwandle, noma imfucuza, kuye ngezinqubo ezikhona kanye nezinsiza ezitholakalayo emazweni angamalungu ahlukene

Abukho ubufakazi obuqinile bokusekela inkolelo yokuthi ukudla okuphilayo kunempilo kunokudla okungezona izinto eziphilayo. Ucwaningo olukhulu olwenziwa yi-UK's Food Safety Authority ngo-2009, kanye ne-Stanford University ngo-2012, aluzange lwembule umehluko obalulekile mayelana nokuphepha noma ukudla okunomsoco. nakuba laba baphetha ngokuthi ukudla ukudla okuphilayo kunganciphisa ukuchayeka ezibulala-zinambuzane kanye namagciwane amelana nama-antibiotics

Ukuchelela kwezolimo kubhekisela ekusetshenzisweni kwamanzi okulawulwayo ngokusebenzisa izinhlelo ezenziwe ngabantu. Lezi zinhlelo zenzelwe ukuxazulula inkinga yokunisela izitshalo ezindaweni ezingenazo imvula noma imvula encane. Amanzi adingwa yizitshalo ukuze kube lula ukuhamba phezulu Amanzi azungeze izitshalo ehlisa izinga lokushisa endaweni. Ezinye izinhlelo zokunisela zezolimo i-drip, imisele, izikhukhula, amandla adonsela phansi, i-sprinkler, i-sub-irrigation kanye ne-centre-pivot irrigation.

Ezinye izinzuzo zezindlela zokulima zesimanje yilezi: Ukwenyuka komkhiqizo, Ukukhiqiza okuthuthukisiwe, Ukuthuthukisa isimo senhlalo nomnotho sabalimi, Kunikela emnothweni wezwe, Ikhwalithi ephezulu yomkhiqizo, Ukugcinwa okuthuthukisiwe kokugcinwa nokuncishiswa kokusanhlamvu okusanhlamvu, Ukuvikela izitshalo ekulimaleni kwazo zonke izinhlobo. izinhlobo

Ezweni lonke, kungatholakala izinhlobo ezahlukene zenhlabathi futhi uhlobo ngalunye lunezici ezihlukile zomzimba, amakhemikhali kanye ne-biological. Inhlabathi ye-alluvial ithathwa njengenhlabathi evunde kakhulu equkethe i-potassium kuyo futhi ilungele izitshalo zokulima ezifana komoba, i-paddy kanye ne-plantain. Inhlabathi ebomvu ine-iron eningi futhi isetshenziselwa ukutshala imbewu yegremu, amantongomane kanye nembewu ye-castor.Inhlabathi emnyama ine-calcium eningi, i-magnesium ne-potassium esetshenziselwa ukutshalwa kwe-chilly, i-jowar, ukotini, imbewu kawoyela kanye nommbila. Okokugcina, inhlabathi enesihlabathi inomsoco omncane, kodwa iwusizo ekutshaleni izitshalo ezifana nekakhukhunathi
Imikhuba yezolimo e-India ihlukaniswa ngesisekelo sesizini njengesitshalo se-kharif kanye nesitshalo se-rabi. Isilimo se-Kharif sibhekisela kuleso sitshalo esivunwa ngenkathi yemvula
Izitshalo ze-rabi zibhekisela kuleso sitshalo esivunwa ngesikhathi sasebusika. Izibonelo zezitshalo zamarabi ukolweni, amazambane, njll

Ngokujwayelekile, ukulima kwamaNdiya kusekelwe ezingeni lokuziphilisa. Lokhu kusho ukuthi ukulima kwenziwa ukuze kuhlangatshezwane nezidingo zabalimi. Ngamanye amazwi, ukulima ngokuziphilisa kubhekisela kulokho kulima lapho umkhiqizo ulingana nokusetshenziswa. Akukho okusanhlamvu kokudla okusalayo okuvelayo

Ngaphansi kokulima okuqashile; umphakathi wabalimi umi njengabanikazi bomhlaba omkhulu ohlukaniswe waba yizindawo ezincane futhi uzinze phakathi kwamapulazi angamalungu ngokumelene nokukhokhwa kwerenti engaguquki. Umlimi ngamunye angakwazi ukulahla umkhiqizo ngendlela athanda ngayo.

Ngaphansi kwalokhu, izitshalo ezikhiqizwayo zinqunywa ngokuhambisana nenkambiso ebekiwe phakathi kwabanikazi bomhlaba kanye ne-baradaris. Umgomo wokutshala ngokuhlanganyela uzohluka uma izindleko zokulima ziphelele futhi/noma ingxenye zithwelwe umnikazi wendawo

Ezinye zezinzuzo zokuqala ipulazi lakho elimile zihlanganisa: Ukukhulisa izitshalo nemikhiqizo ehlukahlukene, Ukuhlinzeka umndeni wakho, abangani, nomphakathi ngokudla okunempilo nokunomsoco, Ukuhlinzeka ngemisebenzi yomphakathi wakini, Ukugwema izingozi ezivamile zokulima, njengokuchayeka kumakhemikhali, izingozi zesimo sezulu, nokunye

Imikhakha ehlukene yezolimo i-horticulture, aquaculture, ukulima ubisi, ukulima kwemvelo, izinkukhu, i-sericulture, i-vermiculture kanye ne-marketing gardening. Uma incazelo ebanzi yezolimo icatshangwa ngakho-ke ingabandakanya amagatsha, njengobuchwepheshe bembewu, i-Nematology, isitshalo. ukuzalanisa kanye nezakhi zofuzo, isayensi yomhlabathi, i-agronomy njll

Abalimi kumele baqonde izimo zokutshala endaweni, izidingo zomhlabathi, ukuhambisana kwezitshalo, njll. ukuze babe nebhizinisi eliphumelelayo lokulima. Ulwazi oluyisisekelo lokulima kanye nezinsiza ezidingekayo kusiza abalimi ukukhulisa izitshalo zabo

Ezinye izindlela zokulima okusimeme yilezi: Ukujikeleziswa kwezitshalo nokuhlukahluka, Ukukhulisa izitshalo ezisivalile, Ukunciphisa ukulima, Ukucabangela ukulawulwa kwezinambuzane okudidiyelwe, Ukwamukela ukulima okudidiyelwe (imfuyo nezitshalo), Ukulandela izinqubo ze-agroforestry, Ukuphatha indawo kanye nezinhlelo zokulima

Inqubo yokutshala endaweni eyehlelayo ilandela imigqa yayo yokuphakama. Kulo mkhuba ama-ruts enziwa igeja ancike emthambekeni kunokuba ahambisane. Izitshalo ziphula ukugeleza kwamanzi futhi zivimbela ukuguguleka komhlabathi, ngaleyo ndlela kwenze ukulima ngamakhonto kube okusimeme. indlela yokulima

Ngokwencazelo yesichazamazwi, Ukulima kuyisenzo noma inqubo yokusebenza emhlabathini, ukutshala imbewu, nokutshala izitshalo ezidliwayo. Ungachaza futhi ukufuya izilwane ukuze uthole ubisi noma inyama njengokulima . Ukulima kuyindlela enhle yokuchaza indlela yokuphila kanye ne umsebenzi wabantu abamisebenzi yabo isembonini yezolimo.  Ibizo elithi  ipulazi, elisuselwe eNkathini Ephakathi yesiLatini, ekuqaleni lalisho ukuthi, Ukuqashiswa kwepulazi.
Ezolimo zenza cishe u-4.5% weGross Domestic Product yase-United States. Nakuba, kwamanye amazwe amaningi, ezolimo zifaka isandla ngokuphindwe ka-5-10 ku-GDP

Ezolimo zidlala indima ebalulekile emnothweni wamazwe asathuthuka, futhi zihlinzeka ngomthombo wokudla, imali engenayo kanye nemisebenzi kubantu basemakhaya. Emazweni amaningi ezolimo ziwumthombo ohamba phambili kwezomnotho, lawo mazwe asiza ekuhlinzekeni ezinye ze-US nokudla
